A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredibly disappointing. I loved The Force Awakens and was so excited to see how TLJ answered the many questions it raised and further developed the relationships between its characters. Unfortunately\, TLJ gave us a throwaway non-resolution of exactly one of those questions\, and left the rest in the dust. The one good thing I can say about this movie is that it's very pretty\, but Rian Johnson's truly baffling writing/directing choices gave the whole thing about as much impact and emotional payoff as a poorly timed whoopee cushion. I had to duck out of the theater in the middle of a climactic scene because I couldn't stop laughing at how ridiculous it all was. Do yourself a favor and skip Episode 8\, or if you really must see it\, wait until you can rent it for $3 on Youtube.
